news.content:
üì£ New Partner on the Global 3Node Marketplace


We‚Äôre excited to announce a new 3Node partner for North America on the Global 3Node Marketplace: Duck Farm Data!


Started by farmer and community member Nelson Anderson, Duck Farm Data has launched its first product, ‚ÄúThe Peking,‚Äù this week.


As a long-term farmer with an impressive setup, Nelson knows what people looking to start or expand their farm want. And he plans to build out several new models of certified 3Nodes in the near future.


Take a look at the full announcement for all the details and click here to view or purchase ‚ÄúThe Peking‚Äù 3Node (U.S. only)!
news.excerpt: A warm welcome to Duck Farm Data, the newest 3Node partner for North America!

previous.title: Today is Earth Day!
previous.excerpt: At ThreeFold, we believe in "Planet First." Take a look at some of the ways ThreeFold is acting to positively impact the planet.
